Compression Fitted Loose Quantity:In Stock 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930 Add to Cart There are many training shorts out there. But there is only one Under Armour®. The Multiplier 10” Shorts use UA’s signature Moisture Transport System to wick sweat from the body and then dry quickly. That way you stay light and comfortable so you can power through your training. The UA waistband makes sure you have a secure, comfortable fit, and side seam pockets give you easy storage on the move. UA is never afraid to be bold, so we add an aggressive colorblock pattern. Get noticed and perform better with UA’s lightweight, loose training shorts.
